 Hi guys,
 Thanks for the ideas.
 I think I will solve the problem
 this way.
 I will write a 
 "testFilters" method in the base class, 
  which will use reflection to call 
  all the tests that subclass requires.
 
 I don't want to use a composite method
  void testAll()
 {
   testOne();
   testTwo();
 }

  because I still want to have "setUp",
  "tearDown" called.

best regards, 
  Kaloyan
